Package com.example.qrazyqrsrus

Class SendMessageDto

java.lang.Object
com.example.qrazyqrsrus.SendMessageDto
public class SendMessageDto extends Object
Represents a data transfer object (DTO) for sending messages through the server to Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM). This DTO includes fields for specifying the recipient(s) of the message, the content of the notification, and any relevant topic or event ID. This class is utilized to package and send notification data to the server, which then communicates with FCM to deliver push notifications to users. The structure and implementation were inspired by instructional content by Phillipp Lackner.

  • Method Details

    • getTo

      public String getTo()
      Gets the recipient's token. This token is unique to each device and is used to direct the message to a specific user or device.
      Returns:
      A string representing the recipient's token.

    • setTo

      public void setTo(String to)
      Sets the recipient's token. This token is unique to each device and is used to direct the message to a specific user or device.
      Parameters:
      to - A string representing the recipient's token.

    • getNotification

      public NotificationBody getNotification()
      Gets the notification body. The notification body contains the title and message body of the notification.
      Returns:
      An instance of NotificationBody containing the notification's details.

    • setNotification

      public void setNotification(NotificationBody notification)
      Sets the notification body. The notification body contains the title and message body of the notification.
      Parameters:
      notification - An instance of NotificationBody to be sent as part of the notification.

    • getTopic

      public String getTopic()
      Gets the topic name. The topic name is used when sending messages to groups of users subscribed to a particular topic.
      Returns:
      A string representing the topic name.

    • setTopic

      public void setTopic(String topic)
      Sets the topic name. The topic name is used when sending messages to groups of users subscribed to a particular topic.
      Parameters:
      topic - A string representing the topic name.

    • getEventId

      public String getEventId()
      Gets the event ID. The event ID can be used to identify the specific event associated with the notification.
      Returns:
      A string representing the event ID.

    • setEventId

      public void setEventId(String eventId)
      Sets the event ID. The event ID can be used to identify the specific event associated with the notification.
      Parameters:
      eventId - A string representing the event ID.
